short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and tag your favorie items

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is useful for Bridesquad admins to save and collect curated items to themed party collections that are available on the Bridesquad mobile app (bridesquadapp.com).

When logged in, admins can browse items from favorite sites and marketplace sites like Amazon and save those items to curated lists that match party themes on the Bridesquad mobile app.

Simply browse and save the items your like most by opening the extension, tagging the correct theme from the drop down list and selecting save!
